attributes.action: get Mr Cannon back to the craft and design department in Breadalbane Academy and send Ms. Fitzpatrick home to Australia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in Breadalbane Academy who take craft and design do not appreciate the exchange of Mr Cannon for Ms. Fitzpatrick. We would like Mr Cannon returned home immediatly so that we can complete the course and people won't walk out.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
